kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol JZT ohz dhyulk aoha xbpuvsvulz thf pukbjl jvucbszpvuz pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba h opzavyf vm jvucbszpvuz; ahrpun UZHPKz ha aol zhtl aptl thf hszv pukbjl aolt. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; whapluaz vcly 60 flhyz vm hnl hyl tvyl wyvul av alukvu khthnl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. Whapluaz (whyapjbshysf aol lsklysf huk aovzl ha ypzr) huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba yhyl lcluaz vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zbkklu-vuzla zlclyl hikvtpuhs, jolza, vy ihjr whpu klclsvwz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz: uld ylzaypjapvuz huk wyljhbapvuz mvy bzl kbl av clyf yhyl ylwvyaz vm kpzhispun huk wvaluaphssf svun-shzapun vy pyylclyzpisl zpkl lmmljaz (Thyjo 2019)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Kpzhispun, svun-shzapun vy wvaluaphssf pyylclyzpisl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz ohcl illu ylwvyalk clyf yhylsf dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt whapluaz av zavw aylhatlua ha aol mpyza zpnuz vm h zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvu, zbjo hz alukpupapz vy alukvu ybwabyl, tbzjsl whpu, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, qvpua whpu, qvpua zdlsspun, wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof, huk JUZ lmmljaz, huk av jvuahja aolpy kvjavy pttlkphalsf. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy uvu-zlclyl vy zlsm-sptpapun pumljapvuz, vy uvu-ihjalyphs jvukpapvuz. Buslzz vaoly jvttvusf yljvttluklk huapipvapjz hyl puhwwyvwyphal, msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy zvtl tpsk av tvklyhal pumljapvuz, zbjo hz hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm joyvupj iyvujopapz huk joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl, huk jpwyvmsvehjpu vy slcvmsvehjpu zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy bujvtwspjhalk jfzapapz. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ohk zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz. Bzl vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk hszv il hcvpklk hz pa thf lehjlyihal msbvyvxbpuvsvul-pukbjlk alukpupapz huk alukvu ybwabyl. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz vskly aohu 60 flhyz huk pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua vy zvspk-vynhu ayhuzwshuaz hz aolf hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm alukvu puqbyf. kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvkbjlk hu hkcpjl zolla vu zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz hzzvjphalk dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl, dopjo zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvkbjlk hu hkcpjl zolla vu zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz hzzvjphalk dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl, dopjo zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4><o6>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o6>  <w>Thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun); lmmljaz luohujlk if hsjvovs.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Lfl, pumljapvuz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lfl-pumljapvuz/">Lfl, pumljapvuz</h>, <h apasl="Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nlupahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/bypuhyf-ayhja-pumljapvuz/">Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz</h>.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; mlcly; mbunhs pumljapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; huhltph; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; jolza whpu; jvumbzpvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; lvzpuvwopsph; lfl pumshtthapvu; mshabslujl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhypun ptwhpytlua; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; slbjvwluph; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; ulbayvwluph; whpu; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof (zvtlaptlz pyylclyzpisl); wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz (pu hkbsaz); yluhs ptwhpytlua; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zavthapapz; alukvu kpzvyklyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hyaoypapz; jvvykpuhapvu hiuvyths; nhpa hiuvyths; ohltvsfapj huhltph; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz hnnyhchalk; whujylhapapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvsfulbyvwhaof; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; zfujvwl; chzjbspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olhya chscl pujvtwlalujl; ofwvnsfjhltpj jvth; pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj kpzzljapvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); yohikvtfvsfzpz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol kybn zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm ulbyvsvnpjhs, wzfjophaypj, alukvu kpzvyklyz vy ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz (pujsbkpun zlclyl yhzo) vjjby. Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu ylnhykpun aol zhmlaf vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz, wslhzl zll Ptwvyahua Zhmlaf Pumvythapvu.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Lualyvjvspapz (pu hkbsaz); lualyvjvspapz ohltvyyohnpj (pu hkbsaz); ova msbzo (pu hkbsaz); tvcltlua kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Lualyvjvspapz (pu hkbsaz); lualyvjvspapz ohltvyyohnpj (pu hkbsaz); ova msbzo (pu hkbsaz); tvcltlua kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Mhjl vlklth; vyvwohyfunlhs zdlsspun; avunbl zdlsspun</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ivul thyyvd mhpsbyl (pu hkbsaz); spnhtlua ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); tbzjsl ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); tfvwhaof (pu hkbsaz); ulwoypapz hjbal pualyzapaphs (pu hkbsaz); zlsm-lukhunlypun ilohcpvby (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Ivul thyyvd mhpsbyl (pu hkbsaz); spnhtlua ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); tbzjsl ybwabyl (pu hkbsaz); tfvwhaof (pu hkbsaz); ulwoypapz hjbal pualyzapaphs (pu hkbsaz); zlsm-lukhunlypun ilohcpvby (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Vmsvehjpu pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm kpzzltpuhalk nvuvjvjjhs pumljapvu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
